name: pow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially in children's cartoons) a word that represents the noise of an explosion or a gun being shot: When I shout "Pow!" that means I've shot you and you have to pretend to be dead.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(a word representing) a sudden loud noise, as that of an explosion or of a gun being fired: All of a sudden we heard pow! pow! pow! – like shots being fired.
abbreviation for prisoner of war
